declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: We confirm that we will administer the estate of Deceased fn Deceased ln, according to law. We will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks us to do so, we will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.submitWarning: Once everyone has agreed the legal statement and made their declaration, this information can’t be changed.
declaration.understandItem1: our application will be rejected if we do not answer any questions about the information we have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against us if we are found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information Applicant fn Applicant ln has given in their application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: Deceased fn Deceased ln was born on 1 January 1950 and died on 1 January 2020, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: We, Applicant fn Applicant ln of Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, Exec4 Name of Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, Exec5 Name of Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom and Exec6 Name of Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, make the following statement:

value.name: Applicant fn Applicant ln, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.
value.sign: Applicant fn Applicant ln will send to the probate registry what we have seen and believe to be the true and original last will and testament of Deceased fn Deceased ln.

value.name: Exec4 Name, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.
Exec5 Name, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.
Exec6 Name, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in Deceased fn Deceased ln which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of Deceased fn Deceased ln and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £2000000.00 and the net value for the estate amounts to £1000000.00.

value.executor: Exec2 Name, an executor named in the will, is not making this application because they died before Deceased fn Deceased ln died.
Exec3 Name, an executor named in the will, is not making this application because they died after Deceased fn Deceased ln died.
Exec7 Name, an executor named in the will, is not making this application but reserves power to do so at a later date. They have been notified in writing.
Exec8 Name, an executor named in the will, is not making this application now and gives up the right to do so in the future.

welshDeclaration.accept: Rwy’n cadarnhau y byddaf yn gweinyddu ystad yr unigolyn sydd wedi marw yn unol â’r gyfraith, a bod fy  nghais yn gywir.
welshDeclaration.confirm: Rydym yn cadarnhau y byddwn yn gweinyddu ystad Deceased fn Deceased ln, yn unol â’r gyfraith. Byddwn yn:
welshDeclaration.requests: Os bydd y gofrestrfa brofiant (y llys) yn gofyn inni byddwn yn:
welshDeclaration.confirmItem3: cadw cofnod llawn o’r ffordd y mae’r ystad wedi cael ei gweinyddu
welshDeclaration.requestsItem1: darparu manylion llawn yr ystad a’r ffordd y cafodd ei gweinyddu
welshDeclaration.requestsItem2: dychwelyd y grant profiant i’r llys
welshDeclaration.submitWarning: Unwaith y bydd pawb wedi cytuno i’r datganiad cyfreithiol ac wedi gwneud eu datganiad, ni ellir newid yr wybodaeth hon.
welshDeclaration.understandItem1: y bydd ein cais yn cael ei wrthod os na fyddwn yn ateb unrhyw gwestiynau am yr wybodaeth rydym wedi’i rhoi
welshDeclaration.understandItem2: y gellir dwyn achos troseddol yn ein herbyn am dwyll os penderfynir ein bod heb ddweud y gwir neu wedi bod yn anonest yn fwriadol

welshLegalStatement.intro: Mae’r datganiad hwn wedi’i seilio ar yr wybodaeth y mae Applicant fn Applicant ln wedi’i rhoi yn eu cais. Bydd yn cael ei storio fel cofnod cyhoeddus.
welshLegalStatement.deceased: Deceased fn Deceased ln ar undefined a bu farw ar undefined, ac roedd fel arfer yn preswylio yng Nghymru a Lloegr.
welshLegalStatement.applicant: Rydym ni, Applicant fn Applicant ln o Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, Exec4 Name o Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, Exec5 Name o Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom a/ac Exec6 Name o Wells Cathedral Wells BA5 2PA United Kingdom, yn gwneud y datganiad canlynol:

value.name: Mae Applicant fn Applicant ln, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys, yn gwneud cais am brofiant.
value.sign: Bydd Applicant fn Applicant ln yn anfon i’r Gofrestrfa Brofiant yr hyn yr ydym wedi’i weld a’i gredu i fod yn ewyllys a thestament gwir a gwreiddiol olaf Deceased fn Deceased ln.

value.name: Mae Exec4 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys fel , yn gwneud cais am brofiant.
Mae Exec5 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys fel , yn gwneud cais am brofiant.
Mae Exec6 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys fel , yn gwneud cais am brofiant.

welshLegalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: Hyd eithaf ein gwybodaeth a’n cred, nid oedd unrhyw dir wedi’i freinio yn Deceased fn Deceased ln a setlwyd cyn marwolaeth (ac nid drwy ewyllys) Deceased fn Deceased ln ac a oedd dal yn dir a setlwyd er gwaethaf y farwolaeth honno.
welshLegalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: Mae gwerth gros yr ystad yn £2000000.00 ac mae gwerth net yr ystad yn £1000000.00.

value.executor: Nid yw Exec2 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys, yn gwneud y cais hwn oherwydd bu iddynt farw cyn i Deceased fn Deceased ln farw.
Nid yw Exec3 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys, yn gwneud y cais hwn oherwydd bu iddynt farw ar ôl i Deceased fn Deceased ln farw.
Nid yw Exec7 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys, yn gwneud y cais hwn ond maent yn cadw’r hawl i wneud hynny ar ddyddiad diweddarach. Maent wedi cael eu hysbysu am hyn yn ysgrifenedig.
Nid yw Exec8 Name, ysgutor a enwir yn yr ewyllys, yn gwneud y cais hwn nawr ac maent yn rhoi fyny yr hawl i wneud hynny yn y dyfodol.
